mentions.quote: She needed to move fast to get Jerrick out of here before something else arrived.
Javlyn dug through the bone pile for the strongest and longest femurs she could find.
Tearing off her leather jerkin, she wrapped the bones to form a draggable litter.
She used her belt to make a chest strap and then began to move as quickly as possible back down the passageway towards the cave entrance.
Javlyn fought to get Jerrick back on the litter, but it was so much harder now in the narrow passageway.
Javlyn gave up on the litter and drug Jerrick with all her might.

Seeing Javlyn covered in sweat and with terror in her eyes, Jerrick fought his way upright and together they leaned on each other as they made the last few steps out of the cave and all the way back to the village.
"No time to explain," Javlyn managed to say between heavy breaths, "we have to go. Now."
They were silent the entire way back, and - other than a single short conversation the next day - they maintained that silence.
